name: Call of the Haunted (Anime)
text: When this card is activated: Special Summon any number of monsters in your GY in face-up Attack Position as Zombie-Type with 0 DEF. If a monster you control whose original Type is not Zombie is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY, Special Summon it in face-up Attack Position as a Zombie-Type with 0 DEF and increase its ATK by 100.
